name: cricket
description: Your central hub for all things cricket, featuring live scores, news, and comprehensive match data.

name: venu search
description: Find detailed information about cricket stadiums and grounds worldwide, including history and statistics.

name: match history
description: Access full scorecards, results, and detailed records of past cricket matches from all formats.

name: player search
description: Look up comprehensive profiles, career statistics, and performance records for any cricketer.

name: team search
description: Get detailed information about cricket teams, including squad details, performance history, and rankings.

name: standings
description: View current team rankings and points tables across various tournaments and cricket formats.

name: top scorers
description: See the leading run-scorers and batting performers in ongoing and recent cricket tournaments.

name: upcoming matches
description: Check the schedule of future cricket matches, series, and tournaments across all formats.

name: live matches
description: Follow live cricket matches with real-time score updates, commentary, and match progress.
